channel.title: billboards – FVM
channel.description: B2B Marketing and Advertising Agency in Philadelphia

item.title: WARNING: 230,000+ insects were harmed in the making of this ad
item.dc:creator: FVM
item.description: Today’s creative inspiration is brought to you by Alexandra Pickel, our Director of Branding and all-around “bug gal.” Alex spotted an insecticide company that’s taking their advertising to the next level with killer messaging that really sticks.
item.content:encoded: Today’s creative inspiration is brought to you by Alexandra Pickel, our Director of Branding and all-around “bug gal.” Alex spotted an insecticide company that’s taking their advertising to the next level with killer messaging that really sticks. Orphea4D insecticide decided to transform an ordinary billboard into a giant insect trap for some real-life pest protection. Pretty incredible, huh? We certainly thought so!
